document.full_text: yemeni foreign minister abubakr al-qirbi said he hopes for a deal on a transition of power in yemen on saturday, and that the time frame of a transfer of power by president ali abdullah saleh could be negotiated.
document.title: yemen president nearing transition deal: minister
lines_and_colors: yemeni foreign minister abubakr al-qirbi said he hopes for a deal on a transition of power in yemen on saturday, and that the time frame of a transfer of power by president ali abdullah saleh could be negotiated.
